item.description:
Since our last hockey event was successful we will organizing another hockey night to see the Edmonton Oilers on Tuesday February 13. We will be getting group tickets and tickets will be about 35 dollars (with service charge). You can either send me the full amount or pay a deposit of 20 dollars per ticket. For your convenience there is a pay-pal link on the bottom. We will be meeting at 6:30 PM at Hurricane O'Reilly's to give out the tickets. If you are interested please RSVP by January 30.

Go Oilers!

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Hockey Night in Canada - Edmonton Style
